summary: Changes the Animation for the female City Guards to the female one.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply changes the animation of the female City Guards from the male to the female animation by unchecking the flag "Opposite Gender Anims"

It will NOT look exactly like shown in the pictures, because I have some mods turned on.

I added a file that changes the animations for the female Stormcloak Soldiers too.
This could fix the issue that some female Guards still use the male animation.

COMPATIBILITY:
Is NOT compatible with any mod editing the female Guards templates.
Could be interfere with the start of the Dawnguard questline (you could still ask male Guards).
If you find any kind of issue report in the comments.

If you find any unchanged guards tell me.

*sorry for my bad English, it's not my native language*

Thanks to:
- Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit
- AncientKane (again) for the mod suggestion
author: xMaster2072

files.name: Female City Guards and Stormcloak Soldiers
